title: Crime Alert 06.25.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 06.25.19
description:
A Texas mother of five charged after playing a game of chicken with her young children in a car. One dies after being hit. Friend of Sarah Stern, strangled and thrown off a bridge, made to look like a suicide, sentenced to life without parole. A man on trial for burglary throws his feces at the judge.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
